content.detailedDescription: I don���t see it when i make a photo
content.summary: I don´t see it when i make a photo

content.detailedDescription:
Hi 
last night at 1.20am friday the 19 of february 2010

i was out side looking over donegal bay when i saw what looked like a plane or something with lights on it  hovering high in the sky. then it just dropped from high in the horizon to just above the mountains. (at insane speed, not possible!)
i first thought it was a star or a satelite but then the movement made me think other wise!
it then hovered and moved right to left and diagonally and in every direction. now i'm no expert but it was moving at a speed and  in a way that defied physics !!!
 
i've never seen anything like this before, i called my 62 yr old dad to come out to see it and we watched it for about 5 mins, he was shocked as well !! 

i just felt a bit stumped because i knew what ever it was it defied logic !

the object stayed for about 5 mins and then just flew away from me until i couldn't see it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Flying object over donegal bay, ireland, europe

content.detailedDescription:
On a cloudy evening around christmastime, my 14-year-old daughter and i were outside in our backyard with our dogs, doing one of the frequently needed bathroom breaks for our new border collie puppy. 

the sky was overcast with the clouds low and visible, reflecting the city lights, as is common on a winter night.

we live in clovis, close to the fresno-yosemite airport, which gets routine air traffic and also has air reserve practice a couple of times a month.

we were facing northeast.  from behind us and overhead, a pretty large, dark boomerang shape glided silently across the sky going from south to north.   about ten slowly blinking red lights echoed the object's shape.

we noticed it because it was very big and right overhead and close and had blinking lights.  it just catches your eye, that does. my daughter and i noticed it at about the same time, i think.    
 
the lights seemed to be positioned in the midbody along the wings, echoing  the shape of the object.

the boomerang looked like about a 120-130 degree angle.   

it was going pretty slow for something that big.  like it had no stall speed.  it looked low, between us and the clouds for sure. 

 how big?  hard to say. it was pretty big, though.  if i held my arms up, i could not have covered the shape with both my hands outspread. not even close.  maybe if i had a piece of legal sized paper, that might have covered it.

my daughter and i just looked at each other and then stared at it.  i don't remember if it went out of sight or if i just went inside.  i think it just flew off.

i don't remember if we said anything at the time.  nothing memorable.  maybe something like, "boy, what is that?"  i felt kind of stunned.  

at first i thought...What is it? and tried to find a category for it.  finding no category is a little confusing when the thing is some kind of flying craft.  seems like it should be a plane or a blimp or something we know to fly.  

we didn't say anything else at the time and we didn't talk about it.  

recently i brought it up in family conversation and my  husband asked why didn't i say anything, and i am not sure.  my daughter told about it too and said then that there were helicopters flying around awhile afterward. 

i sort of felt like it was being escorted somewhere.
content.summary: Dark double-wing shape with red blinking lights

content.detailedDescription:
The date of this event is subject as i am not 100 % sure but it did take place in the winter months of late 1995 to early 1996. while working in a machine shop in foxwarren manitoba at the time i was staying at a farm house 3 miles south east of town and 3 1/2 miles south of yellowhead hi way 16.  one night while watching tv i had this strange sensation come over me to get up and go outside. the sensation was very brief and i almost mistook it that my imagination was playing tricks on me. but something compelled me to put on my jacket and boots and grab a large flashlight and head out the door. 
i also recall hearing a light humming sound that reminded me of a train way off in the distance.  i left the house and remember it being -20 or colder at the time. i walked down the farm lane about 150 meters out onto the gravel road heading west. the sky had a cieling of about 500 feet and it was a very dark night. i looked back towards the house to see 2 very large glowing white lights. these lights where about 200 feet up from the ground and traveling straight west just over the bluff of trees behind the house,soon after that there is a large field west of the house and i got a very clear view of the objects. all i could think of at the time was ok they are not planes or helicopters, what the hell are they?  i was compelled to turn on my flash light and try and signal them but something inside me said do you think that is a good idea. being alone on the farm and yes slightly scared. i opted to just observe the lights without turning my flashlight on.

 they traveled beside each other and made a faint humming sound and i observed them moving very slowly straight west over the field. i would have to say the diameter of the 2 lights would be 40 to 50 feet across each.
content.summary: 2 white objects 200 to 300 feet up moving slow and humming sound

content.detailedDescription: Late october 1998���. hudson lake, oklahoma, 3:10 am. i am an aircraft mechanic for a major airline since 1988. i know what a conventional aircraft looks like. i turned off my alarm and sat up on the edge of the bed, i get up every night, 5 days a week at this hour to go to work. as i looked out the bedroom window i saw a light emerge into view from the right. it was moving from south to north at a very slow speed. if it had been a cessna 152 aircraft it would have fallen into the lake. it was moving that slow. i then realized i was not looking at an aircraft that i had not seen before. i happened to have a pair of binoculars in the bottom drawer on my night stand. i got them and ran over to the window. there was a half moon that night and no clouds. the craft was about 1000 ft in altitude and about 300 yards from shore of lake hudson. when i looked at it through the binoculars it was definitely round and had lights all around the edge of it on the bottom about a foot from the edge. they were all red except at the back where there was one white light. all the red lights would blink off then back on in counter clockwise sequence around the craft. they were spaced about two feet apart. it was definitely a metallic surface because the town lights of salina oklahoma were reflecting off the bottom of it. i could not see the top because i was under it. the craft was about 40 feet in diameter. i followed it with the binoculars till it went out of sight behind some trees. i quickly got dressed and ran outside to follow it some more but it had already gone. i watched it for about 3 to 4 minutes.
content.summary: Circular disc about 300 to 400 yrds away.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 1.30am my friends and i went out for a cigarette when we noticed a large multicoloured flashing light in the sky. it was flashing bright white red blue and green. it would flash extremely bright at times and at other times dimming and completely fading out before returning to flashing. we left to go inside once we had noticed it moving and then returned approx 5mins later and it was still there. at this time my dog took off and would not return to our calls which has never happenned before, after getting a torch and searching for him we found him with his tail between his legs and uncooperative but okay. 
it was extremely large, speherical, and flashing.  we had also noticed one earlier however the one earlier was a singular white light travelling across the sky at an extremely high speed.

at the time of writing this (2.24am)it is still there. we have video footage but we are unable to up load on to the computer at the moment, will send it with your reply. signing off at 2.50am and it is still there. however it is getting dimmer and moving south. 


samantha spencer
auckland-new zealand.
content.summary: Going out for cigarette, looking at stars, looking at stars, saw multi coloured flashing light fading in and out,and moving,

content.detailedDescription: Ok...So now what. i actually saw something very strange tonight. i live in ballrd, wa. my building has a rooftop deck. the sun had set and the sky was mostly dark now.  i was smoking a cig, and watching the normal path of air traffic that flows into seatac airport. i just happened to be looking at a patch of ski to my south, when i noticed a flying v- shaped bommerrang craft flying lower than normal air traffic, about 1500 ft, traveling directly east at a high rate of speed. it was completely dark..No aircraft lights at all and completely silent. if, i held out my arm, it would take my entire hand to fully block the object.  it blended in perfectly to the night sky. it was more like watching an invisible shape blocking the sky behind it as it moved. i watched the object travel from west to east until it disappeared in the distace and darkness (about 15 seconds). i don't believe that anyone could have seen this object unless you just happened to be looking directly at it, as i was. i feel kinda freaked out because, #1. i definitely saw this. 2. because i know that i definitely saw this, what was it?, and what is it doing? this is not a joke. i am someone who knows the value of the scientific method. summary: flying craft, completely silent and extremely stealthy, flew over ballard, wa.
content.summary: What i saw was real

content.detailedDescription: Got out of vehicle to visit family, 2 bright lights caught my eye, they were moving together @ the same speed, one ahead of the other, very slowly.  i thought they were stationary, but observed them move across the big dipper.  these were brighter than any star in the sky.  they were both white light that remained constant.  they were not aircraft (confident)i told my wife to look up and she saw the same, as they continued, they got dimmer until they faded away.  i initially thought it was the iss and shuttle, but i checked the nasa website and it lists it as a 5:00 am fly over. it did look consistant with the last flyover i saw a couple of years ago.  still, it is always strange to see something unexpected and like that.
content.summary: 2 bright objects together- non aircraft - south to north

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down 435 going west changing lanes to take highway 10 to desoto.  there was a bright light on the eastbound lanes.  i thought it might be a giant truck with bright, bright lights about the size and brightness of 25 headlights.  there was an accompanying humming sound.

then the top of a tree in the middle of all the highways burst into flames and as i drove by, it continued to burn.

then the light was gone.  

i just on to work and everybody else kept driving too.

so did anybody else see this?

i was startled by the light and the fire.  i thought everyone saw it but was ignoring it.  i was a little scared but i just drove on to work, like everyone else.  when i drove by the spot after work, i didn't think about the spot and didn't look for the tree.  :(
content.summary: Flash of light followed by the top of a tree catching fire.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down 435 going west changing lanes to take highway 10 to desoto.  there was a bright light on the eastbound lanes.  i thought it might be a giant truck with bright, bright lights about the size and brightness of 25 headlights.  there was an accompanying humming sound.

then the top of a tree in the middle of all the highways burst into flames and as i drove by, it continued to burn.

content.summary: Flash of light followed by the top of a tree catching fire

content.detailedDescription: I walked out onto my deck in harrisburg pennsylvania as the sun was setting. as i looked at the sun setting, i noticed only one cloud could be seen in the sky just above and to the left of the sunset. however the cloud moved at a consistent speed from west to east. in the center of the teardrop shaped cloud was a dark shape. i believe the sunset caused the cloud and shape in the center to be visible. it could have been a man made vehicle, but it definetely was under control and was definetely enclosed with a teardropped shaped cloud.
content.summary: Teardrop moving cloud with dark shape in center moving east at sunset

content.detailedDescription:
On wednesday evening 2/17/2010 between 6:30 and 7:00, my gf called me to go outside while she smoked. 

since i have seen something strange in the summer of 2009 (two objects traveled across the entire sky at extremely high altitude one in front of the other and then both returned across the same track) i always scan the sky whenever i take the dogs out or go outside during the evening.

i was only outside for about 30 seconds when i pointed out a bright star like object moving in the sky. i quickly drew her attention to it since it obviously was not a jet. (i am prior usaf) i asked her what she thought it was and it then quickly gained altitude and shrank in size and brightness and then disapeared from view. the total viewing time was very short at about 1 minute or so.
content.summary: Star like object moved across sky then rapidly flew up out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
9 august 2003. 20:41 moscow time (not sure photocamera clock was correct though).

event take place at
ukrain, half-island krimea, town koktebel  (dont know english spelling).

http://maps.Google.Ru/maps?F=q&source=s_q&hl=ru&geocode=&q=koktebel&sll=44.960911,35.237961&sspn=0.171024,0.308304&ie=utf8&hq=&hnear=%d0%9a%d0%be%d0%ba%d1%82%d0%b5%d0%b1%d0%b5%d0%bb%d1%8c,+%d0%90%d0%b2%d1%82%d0%be%d0%bd%d0%be%d0%bc%d0%bd%d0%b0%d1%8f+p%d0%b5%d1%81%d0%bf%d1%83%d0%b1%d0%bb%d0%b8%d0%ba%d0%b0+%d0%9a%d1%80%d1%8b%d0%bc,+%d0%a3%d0%ba%d1%80%d0%b0%d0%b8%d0%bd%d0%b0&ll=44.960911,35.239334&spn=0.171024,0.308304&z=12

  i was on holyday at popular spa "koktebel", went to balcony of my room and saw this object fly over town. it was evening, dusk, lot of lights in town this time (bad for photoset). but the one in the sky was very bright, like a star but much brighter. it fly like an airplane, but cant see it altitude. no sound and dint saw no allusion of fuselage. no standard airplane of helycopter signal lights. anyway object light was to bright for any aircaft that usualy fly this area. 
  its long ago when i saw this object, so i cant remember many things but looking my video i hear my comments on what i saw. i told there that this object appear third time when i took camera to shot it. if i remember well, it lost its brightes to zero twice before i took camera. all watch continue about 5-10 minutes, maybe less. object fly from seaside to the middle of half-island direction most of watch time. most interesting, that object change its flight direction some time. and did it very fast, about 60-90 degree in 2-3 seconds. for my point of view, with speed this object moved and agile this object changed direction it cant be nor airplane nor helycopter.

  i used digital photocamera canon s45, and light was on in room, so camera shot very badly due to part of balcon was in frame. to the human eyes there were much brighter on the street at that time.

here is sound transcription of video.
"so... 'something' is fly. appeared for third time. beautiful flight. what is it - i dont know. cant see it well (now). if there will be time, i will go and turn the room lights off. almost lost it sight (now). not brighter then a star... but still visible.  changing course. so... i lost it. will turn light off now and continue..."
i didnt saw it again, so didnt make new shots.
content.summary: Very bright object moved across sky over town. changed course.

content.detailedDescription:
As i was getting ready to go to bed i noticed that it was a full moon. as my room window faced the moon at around that time i decided to open my blinds and let the light of the moon fill my room. 
i laid in my bed watching the sky and admiring the stars. as i looked southwards i noticed an unusual star. the star seemed to be moving towards my house as it was getting brighter and bigger. this went on for around half hour (that i noticed. then it stopped. i could not possibly say how big it was or how close, low etc but i can say that it was not a plane nor a helicopter. in comparison to the stars around it, it was much bigger and brighter. after it had stopped it started to flash on and off. being a bit wary i called my parents up to my room to take a look. neither could really say what it was. i continued to observe this 'star/plane/ufo?' for the next half hour but there was no more movement and so i fell asleep. 
the next evening, at around the same time i looked to see if this object was there again. it was not and has not been there ever again. i can definitely say that this was not a star, a meteorite, a plane or any other explainable object. i now believe that this was something 'supernatural' maybe alien??
content.summary: Bright light in night sky low down could be seen above row of houses.

content.detailedDescription: We arrived at fuller lake ronnie and i on a fishing trip.It was dark out and we entered into the campground area looking for a campsite, when all of a sudden 2 girls stepped right out in front of my car. i had to stomp on the brakes to avoid hitting them. the had saw our large flashlight shining out of the car window. when i stopped the car they yelled out " are you a park ranger?" seeing our spotlight they assumed so. we told them no , we're just fisherman and laughed. they said they were looking for a ranger because there was a ufo over the lake. and then took off. we looked at each other and gave chase. we followed the light from their flashlight weaving thru the trees. i was yelling at ron '"don't lose them", then all of a sudden we came out into a clearing and there was 6 campsites or so on the edge of the lake with maybe 12 to 15 people standing around, they were all drawn to loking to the south end of the lake. i looked in that direction and saw a disc shaped object hoovering there maybe 150 to 200 ft. off the groundmaybe a 1/3 of a mile away, on the south end of the lake. it was visable due to the lights that were being ammited by it. i aked ron what he thought. it looks like a disc, there was no noise. everyone saw it and was talking about what it could be. i told ron i'm going back to the car to get my binoculars. when i got to the car i relized we had left the light on the car on and the doors open. i guess we were in a hurry. i secured the car and returned with the binoculars. it had not moved. i looked at it and could tell it had red and blue lights revolving around it counter clockwise with a couple of white lights crisscrossing accross the top domed part of the craft. it was amazing then someone else saw me with my binoculars, stated " i didn't even think about that" he reached inside his camper and pulled out a pair of binoculars like you would see on a battleship. he raised them up and said "o my god." i said let me look and had him lean down so i could rest them on someone elses tailgate on their truck. it was amazing ,the view filled the the lense.Everyone saw it. we took pics thru the binoculars and took down everyone names and phone numbers. there was one person in the group was a lawyer so we gave him all the contact names and the film. and he said he would organize reporting the sighting. we all watched in amazement as it just hoovered there. we finely went and set up our camp and we could still see it from there. we built a large fire and watched. after approx. 2 hours or so i loked up and it was just gone. we waited to hear from the contact person, the lawyer, but that never happened. i just don't get it. he was the only person that had the others names and numbers. i just couldn't believe it. but i know that there is at 15 or more people out there that were just as disappointed as i was. i remember like it was yesterday. and will never forget it. it was so close. and was there for so long. there are other people out there that saw it. and i'm sure they haven't forgot also. if this could be posted maybe some others could come forward. it was amazing.
content.summary: Saw a disc shaped object, after it was pointed out by12 to 15 people

content.detailedDescription:
I got off work at 11:30pm and was driving home. there is a bridge that i have to drive over and this is where i first saw the object. it was moving parallel to me at what looked like the same rate. i thought nothing of it because there are two airports near me and i figured it was just another plane.

i turned off of us 41 onto east olympia ave, and came to the stop light. i looked over too my right to see the object moving towards me parallel to the street. this seemed odd because it was about a 90 degree turn from its initial direction, and i hadn't seen it make the turn. usually an airplane that big takes a while to turn. it was moving slowly over the buildings of downtown punta gorda. then it completely stopped moving. it just stopped! airplanes cant hover in the air like that. i was shocked i leaned over the passenger seat to look out the window, and get a better look. it was triangular with a total of seven white lights four, on what i'm calling the back based on the direction it was moving, two close together near the front on the side closer to me, and one in the middle on the side away from me. it also had two red lights on the bottom around the middle evenly spaced parallel to the back.

i was staring at it for a little while then it started moving again. i noticed that as the object was moving the red lights blinked, but when it was still they were off. it appeared that there were two faint white streaks coming from behind the object, but that could have just been clouds.

the object eventually moved out of my vision and i did not pursue it.

 i have been a believer for years now, and i am mixed on whether or not to be happy or nervous at the fact that i have now had experiences myself.


i am a graphic designer so when i got home i sketched out and then modeled the object in 3d, which i am including as an attachment to this report.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A strange triangle shaped ufo with 7 white lights and 2 red lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside smoking a cig, because we dont smoke inside the house, messing around with a laser i have for my rifle, hi powered green laser.
decided i was going to get my rifle out of my truck, turned around after locking up, was walking back to the house, when i saw a blue light, it was really bright, going left right left right, real fast. i stopped, confused at what i saw, we live near an airport, so i thought maybe i was misinterpreting a plane or whatever, then the light stopped, and started doing very tight, and very fast figure 8 pattern, i ran to the door, yelling for my brother, he and his girlfriend came out, and saw what i saw. a bright blue light doing tight and fast figure 8 patterns, i shined it with my laser, (generally, it was kind of far away and hard to judge)
instantly, the blue light stopped. i turned the laser off, and the blue light in the sky turned bright green, and then shot up in the air, a few miles i would guess. it then started doing huge loops, while flashing blue, black, blue, black. i ran inside and grabbed my camera and beat on my father's door yelling for him to come, we went outside, and he also saw it, i got a short recording of it, maybe 1:30 one min 30 seconds.
doing some pretty strange things, but not like what we (me, bro, and his gf) saw. my mother came out and saw the last bit of it, it was maneuvering in strange patterns away from us, towards the south. it went behind the tree line, and that was it.
i was excited, i actually had people see what i see on a regular basis.
and caught it on camera, though crappy quality, i know its authentic.
i see strange things in the sky, quite often, 2-3 times a month usually.
i tell my family about them, but they never believe me, and ive never been fortunate enough to have them with me at the time, or be near a camera until this evening.
im kind of shaky, my nerves are rattly at the moment, its normal and goes away after a little bit, but probably not tonight because i was able to get witnesses, and video.
if there is anyway you can clean this video up some, id like a copy of it, if thats is fine by you guys, id pay for if it necessary.
thanks
content.summary: Blue light flying in patterns, figure 8, loops etc.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog n i was looking in the sky at all the planes flying over ( there was about 4 in under 15 mins) and there was no clouds in the sky until the 3rd plane came there was like a little ball with a thin cloud around it, ( i thought it looked weird but didn't really think any think of it ) the 3rd plane passed the "cloud" and then came the 4th plane, as the 4th plane came closer to the "cloud" i looked away to see where my dog had gone and when i looked back the "cloud" had moved away from the plane, ( i still didnt really think any think of it ) as the 4th plane got closer to the "cloud" i looked away again to see where my dog had gone (i looked away for about 2 secs) and when i looked back the plane had disappeared but the "cloud" was still there. (you know when planes leave a trail in the sky well that had stopped right where the "cloud" was) i blinked and the "cloud" was gone!! i thought it was me being silly, but i saw my friend in the pub later and said to her i saw some think very strange in the sky this afternoon and she asked me if i saw the plane disappear!!I tryed looking for the plane but could not see it,it made me wonder if i was going crazy but i wasnt scared, but i think i should be! now that's very freaky as i didn't tell her where i was or what i saw she told me what she saw and it was the same thing i saw!! what i want to know is how a plane can just disappear?!! there was no think on the news about it or about any plane crashing or any think!! if that wasn't an alien i saw then what was it and what's really going on??
how can a plane disappear and no one report it mising??
content.summary: Small object with a cloud around it made a plane disappear

content.detailedDescription:
Tuesday night, 2/16 at about 6:20, i was driving home, heading north on ne 33rd ave, the closest cross street was probably prescott. the sky was almost dark, a deep twilight blue. i saw a large, cross shaped craft fly out of the east, across my field of vision, then make a large arc and head north by west and dissapear from my view behind the trees and buildings heading east by north. as it crossed in front of my car, i looked up and saw the under-structure which appeared to be a perfectly symetrical cross shape with lights on the outer ends of the arms. as it started to make it's arc, it also banked so i could no longer see the underside. the whole event took approximately 10-15 seconds. i immediately pulled to the side of the road and called keith rowell of oregon mufon to discuss the incident.

the craft seemed to be flying lower than regular air traffic, and the night sky was very clear, with a very slight breeze blowing from north to south. the lights on the craft were red and white, i think. the red lights were blinking, but i don't recall how fast. it was hard to judge the size and height of the craft, but based on the clarity of the structual outline and the speed (it was moving very rapidly) i would say it was about the size of a large airplane and lower in the sky than most would fly in that area. 

when i got home, i was out on my porch (this is just about a mile east of the place where i sighted the craft). i was noticing the air traffic, as it seemed heavier than normal. i live very near the airport. the planes i observed from my porch (normal air traffic for the area) were very high in the sky and moved much slower than the craft i saw. they appeared very ordinary. so i felt sure that what i saw was not part of the normal air traffic or craft for that area.
content.summary: Saw cross shaped object low in sky, moving fast, in an arc

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I have written other places like this one and never received any responses so i don't expect on from you either but ill try. my first memory of them visiting me is when i was 5. i was outside on the babysitters porch dangling my feet over the edge of the porch looking around. it was the summer. and like always something told me to look in my mind and i looked down the street and at thee end of the street over top of mr ks party store was an air craft approximately 300 to 500 ft in diameter coming down the road toward me. no sound just very slowly coming straight down the road. i know they were coming for me. anyway my baby sitter was sitting behind me4 in folding chair just sitting and as i stared at it i pointed up at it coming down the road and said to jeff( can you see it) then my next memory i have is waking up in a bed in his house. there is quite a bit of missing time there and cant recall any of it until im awake the next morning. then there was the summer of very strange things that were going on every day. i believe it was when i was 18 or 19, but it lasted for about 4 months. during this time i had 23 very close encounters one within 20ft including 4 other witnesses and myself then 2 witnesses then myself. this summer i was followed every day in broad daylight by a triangular shaped aircraft. long story short it has been over 10 years since ive heard the voice tell me to look up and see them until recently. for the past 2.5 months or longer there are 2 sometimes 3 extraterrestrial aircraft the are always outside my house. now i live i live in wyoming mi and i also have a girlfriend who lives in portage mi, and there are two sets of them in both places because i have recorded them in both places and have been observed my my girlfriend in portage at the same time i was observing the behind my house in wyoming. if i ask them to do specific things in my head like move to the left they will. i have 23 minutes of them on digital video and have pictures of them on my computer and there pretty awesome if you ask me. when i was younger they wouldent let me get video of them but now they don't care if i take pictures or get video or bring people to see them. every night they are there. its easier to watch them when im out in the country here in portage. i can for sure relate 3 different events with me and my girlfriend daughter her boyfriend and my self. definite abductions in 2 of them and one event where an invisible doorway had been opened to another world not our own as the boy walked through he saw people walking around like humans walk around here only these people were different in appearance and the weird thing is is that the people saw him and they were weird ed out by the fact that he was human /he looked different then they did and his sudden appearance right in front of them once he looked around and realized where he was wasn't right he started walking backwards then all of a sudden he was back in our world. lots of other stuff but im tired of typing so if you would like to get a hold of me of it least point me toward a good hypnotherapist in my area that don't cost to much let me know. now out of the 3 pictures i gave you the spectrum of light has been altered only so you can see the true outline of the craft. im using picassa to enhance the pictures and you will want to zoom in the really see what your looking at. hope to here from you, mike
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 101-500 Feet, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Missing time. close encounter. letting me know they are always listening.

content.detailedDescription: We have much snow and ice hanging over the edge of our roof, ready to fall, so i was looking up after taking the trash can to the curb. i caught the ufo out of the corner of my eye. at first i thought airplane as msp isn't very far away. it was about half the size of a pencil held at arms length. direction was nw to se in the direction of the airport, however, the object didn't make any sound. i've heard many airplanes fly over and they are loud enough to hear. the object was a white sphere. i didn't see any blinking lights, nor did i see wings, and the object didn't appear to be very high. i watched the object til it went behind the neighbors house, so i walked approximately 50 feet to watch it between the 2 nearby homes. i didn't see it any longer. the speed was like that of an airplane, so there is no way it would have traveled far enough in those few seconds to be at the horizon, nor would it have been far enough to have landed if it was an airplane on final approach to msp. the attached photo was taken with my cell camera, which is a samsung highlight with a 3.0 mp camera.
content.summary: Much snow and ice hangs over the edge of our roof so i was looking up, and i caught the ufo out of the corner of my eye,

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were in route from port arthur to houston, traveling west bound on highway 73, we had just passed the landfill(between winnie tx.)the time was about 11:45pm. we were visiting my aunt, in icu in port arthur.
i had just activated(the google navigator)on my 3g phone. i was thinking to myself how cool!, we are tracking in virtual time on a satalite map..."this must be the way we appear from an arial view." at that same instant my friend who was driving,in a calm collective manner says" see i told you that there are ufo's around here!" i looked up, my eyes immeadiately fixated, to the top left corner of the windshield.
and....Sure enough!!! there it was!!!! traveling east bound, about 200 ft above the hwy. it appeared to be pulsating a irradescent/flouresent bright rainbow color, however all of the colors displayed at the same time........
i find that words are very difficult to express completely what we expireinced!!! there is just not any vocabulary that i know of that can replicate what we saw!! however, i will continue at the risk of sounding  completely out of my mind...Lol
there were three rumboid shaped pulsating objects they seemed to be seperate, but yet as one unit?!?!? silently/fluidly traveling east bound,paralell to hwy 73... i have always had a scientific curriosity....I asked my friend"did you see that?!?!What the hell is that!!!???? four times, i also rolled all of the car windows down and i opened the sun roof. this was to reassure myself that we were'nt just seeing a reflection off of the car's glass and the fact that my friend confirmed four times that we were both seeing the same phenomina. as i opened the sun roof,never taking my eyes off of the object, i popped my head up through the sun roof,and said wow!!!! that's no reflection!!! that's a bonified ufo! that very instant, the object made an immeadiate u-turn!!!!!!!!! and now it was following us down hwy73!!! i never once left visual contact with the object. i jumped down into my seat and shouted"they are coming!!!!They are following us!! keep in mind that this is a dark and desolate hwy at this time of the night.
i kept my eye on it, while my friend was franticly speeding up to get away! i could see the same colors pulsating 100ft above the pavement behind us!!,but it seemed very different than what colors you or i are use to???!!!
i was almost hypnotysed by this strange sight...That's when i realized that we were not only being folowed but, also being monitored on a level that no human/animal could even begin to comprehend!!! 
i could see the triangle shaped pulsating rumboids getting larger, and closer, leaving and getting smaller, and yet not moving at all?!!?!?!? well my friend, as strange as it may sound, all of this was taking place simutaneousley, my eyes and brain were not quiet sure how to process all of this together!
we became panicked and sped up to approx. 120mph. again this thing never changed perspective, of course we were speeding, but the object stayed behind us, but not ever moving?!!??!!?
my friend says to me"stop staring at it"!!
the object got almost to the back of my car, then i noticed a yellow/amberish colored column of light slowly coming down to the ground from the object... then the column of light became very very bright, nontransparent, and became almost like an orange fire ball. i could see the grass and the dirt flying about ,under this fireball!! i started screaming""""they are going to blow us up!!!!!!!""""" that instanst, the object started to wobble? and the air all around it seemed to ripple as if it were h20?!?!?! then the object became one with the column of orange/yellow light, it reminded me of how mercury looks on a hard surface. and all in the same split second, the object then  became a bright large sphere, with the same pulsating colorfull pattern... i was shell shocked!!!! did i just see that take place in this demension/this planet/this whatever!!!!!  by this time i could feel a presence in my persona,,,,not anything unusual,,,no strange voices, but almost like my subconcious was suddenly in charge?!!?!I never once felt threatened in that sense, but i was subtlely able to become aware of this new/unfamilair feeling in my head?!?!
sounds lunicital ,i know!!!! but like i said, there is no vocabulary that we have as a species that could come close to propperly describing these events,senses,feelings,"phenominas"
we continued for  for few minutes, then i noticed two cars traveling east bound were coming,after what seemed like an eternity!! i was wide eyed of course waiting to see if those cars would notice what was following us. sure enough.......They all slammed on thier brakes and pulled to the side of the road!!! at that time the object behind us, backed down and in a split second, the sphere divided into two and disapered!!!!!!
i feel like someone else out there had to have seen something. if so please share. i feel a sense of isolation from people who have never expireinced these phenominas, almost like i can not communicate to them the events that took place that cold clear stary night!
i cant help but look to the sky every moment i am outdoors!!!! i am still a bit "rattled" not threatened per say...But i have a sense that who/what ever that was, is still out there, and knows where i am and what i think before i think it!!!!!
well there you go!!! that's my first encounter/interaction with anything/one that has that magnitude of capabilities..
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Circle,   Diamond,   Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Eerily silent, heightened visual alertness,feeling of being completely vulnarable

content.detailedDescription: Driving with husband on i-80 east near central ave exit in el cerrito, ca. freeway faces north/east. 9:46 pm or so - night time. entire horizon/ sky flashed blue light on horizon in direction we were driving - entire horizon. we both witnessed it.
content.summary: Entire horizon flash of blue light

content.detailedDescription: Don't know if anyone has sent you this news story. i immediately thought of ufos. a similar thing happened in natchitoches parish (about an hour and a half south of minden) a couple of weeks earlier. heads were removed with little or no blood. in the natchitoches case, entrails were tied in knots and returned to the body . i'm attaching the minden press-herald article. the story also appeared in the shreveport times website the same day.
content.summary: Surgically beheaded calves with little or no blood.

content.detailedDescription: I was working on my 98 lincoln navigator.I needed some tools,so i walked to our shed that was 20-30 feet away.As i was looking for the tools my mom&mom's boyfriend said mario come to see those lights you like to see so much.I said what lights wait till im done,by then both of them were very exited,so i walked over to them & saw towards the mountains & witnessed a once in a life time experience.(i would like to be join you people on your next gathering,to explain my knoledge and what i know that to this date nobody has seen it or talked about it the way know it).Thank you.
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Egg,   Oval,   Teardrop,   Other
content.summary: 8-12 lights all 2gether like moskitos.

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 6:20 p.M., and i decided to take a dinner break from work.  (rt. 30 and cline).  i was heading west on rt. 30, and i have a habit of looking at the sky for jet with chemtrails.  i looked up and there was a jet without a chemtrail.  out of nowhere from the south comes a big silver ball.  it was headed toward the plane.  it looked like it was going to smack right into the plane.  (i was thinking that there would have to be at least 10 miles distance between them, but i'm not an air traffic controller or pilot, so what do i know).

this silver ball was travelling pretty fast in comparison to the jet, but it passed right by it as it was traveling north.  (i knew i was right, there was some distance between them).  

other than traffic in front of me, all i can see are tree lines to the north and south of rt. 30.  now from the north, the silver ball reappears!!!  i am telling the truth, so help us god.  i now pulled over on rt. 30 and autin ave.  the silver ball hit the jet!!! and continued going south.  it went past the tree line again.  at this point i thought the jet would just start spiraling out of control, but it didn't.  i don't know how much time passed - 15-30 seconds, the silver ball came back out of the south headig north and simply engulfed/encased the jet.  i wanted to run out on rt. 30 and point this out, but that would have been just as crazy as what i saw.

the next thing was pretty amazing.  this huge silver ball which just engulfed a jet - are you ready for this - turned into the biggest star i had ever seen.  september 12 around 6:30 p.M. is starting to turn to dusk.
i sat there for about 5 minutes and there it sat, just shining like a huge bright star in the sky,very out of place for the time of day.  

i pulled out of the parking lot of the old alaskan pipeline bar, and proceeded to the mall just a couple of blocks down to order some chinese take-out.  ran in, placed my order and ran back out to see what was going on.  the big star was still there, but now there were two smaller stars on the horizon, all three formed a triangle.  

i stood against my car, trying to tell if they were falling further down the tree line.  a woman came out of one of the stores in the mall, and i asked her to take a look at this huge bright shining star (very unusual in size, but also just at dusk).  i asked her to see if she thought it was slowly falling in the sky.  she actually stood there with me for about 3-4 minutes and said that it did look like it was falling.

then i spooked her.  i said something to the effect that we should have been expecting to see this yesterday, (meaning 9/11).  can you imagine what she would have done if i told her that 10 minutes earlier this star was a huge silver ball that traveled north, then south,(hitting a jet),then north again, engulfing the jet and turning into a big bright shining star, and the 2 smaller ones weren't there originally???

i then ran back in to get my take-out, headed back to the office, and thought i could view this from the second floor. couldn't see a thing.
there was nothing on the news - ever - about this event!!!!

the next day, (9/13), i went to see a neighbor who "knows the truth is out there", to tell him all about this, but before i could get a word out, he told me his story from the previous day.  (9/12).  it was about 11:00 a.M. and he walked out his front door.  it faces east.  he said he saw this huge silver ball and after watching it for awhile, it turned into a huge bright star.  (he watched it for about a half-hour and had to be on is way.  we live in merrillville, in.

so what did we see?  did anyone else see this?  

also, will someone please tell me that what i am seeing is a satellite.  how do they move?  i have been observing this "star" in the sw sky for almost 5 years.  i think it's a satellite, because i see them in a lot of places in the sky.  it's just that they do "weird" movements.  they flash, as if signalling to each other, and when i was sitting out on my deck the first summer from 10p.M. till dawn, many a nights, every hour for about 5-7 minutes, they do weird manuveurs.  they can do great 90 degree angles, spiral down, do circles and hoops.  are those satellites?

thanks
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Silver ball over schereville, in.

content.detailedDescription:
it was 4:00 am in the city of cumana, sucre state, venezuela, 7 hours east of the capital city caracas. everyone was sleeping, unless a neighbor who was up all night. in the window he saw the object in the sky and called us at home, went to see her mom, my mom and me. i do not believe in such things until i peeked in the window and see something like a fly white, very white, without lights, their movements were like those of an insect flying around a light bulb.
   we were seeing the phenomenon almost an hour until everyone went to bed.
my first reaction was a sort of experiment in the u.S. about venezuela, i refused to believe it was a ufo.
please, i want an explanation, contact me, thank you. i do not know who to believe me, nobody believed me the other day, i was ashamed to continue counting, thinking he was crazy.

i regret not having a video camera to record or take pictures.

i swear to god, for my ancestry than i described here is the truth and nothing but the truth.
content.summary: Strange thing in the sky of cumana at 4:00 am

content.detailedDescription:
Just like the people that saw this in vernon lake in louisiana���they got pics and i got some video���hope they get to see this���

walked outside of our home and saw an orange looking orb to the east from hwy 21 in geneva tx...Went back in and got my camera and my wife and got some video���this thing would fade out for a long time and then the light might be 1 or 2 and then fade again���i waited and filmed what i could from about 7 pm until about 10 pm���the videos are shaky because i am free holding the cam and not on a tripod��� 

phoned 3 friends and they saw it also���one of those said she saw it until 11 pm

i think that the best video on here is 4285 when a truck passes our home and it helps to see how large it is and you can see what we are seeing on the horizon to the east from here���i saw a triangle (1/2 to 1 mile wide) in 2003, missed catching it on camera and now i have a camera near me since then and i���m always looking up���

we have ruled out that this was a natural gas flare because it moved from 90 degrees to about 100-110 degrees within 3 hours from where i was standing���possible comet but it is to now unidentified���i���ll be looking up again tonight

i'll do my best to upload the 3 videos since i am on satellite internet
content.summary: Orange orb lights in sky 16feb10 from 7-10 pm

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming out of the duncan donuts by the old military ocean terminal in bayonne and it was heavy snow. i stayed outside my car looking toward the manhattan skyline which was hardly visible. i glanced up into the snow for a moment as i was about to get in and saw a hole in the clouds open and what i thought at first was a jetliner falling. my heart in a panic,  i thought there would be a crash before my eyes. suddenly this air craft stopped in midair and stated to float in the direction of the verraza
no bridge. when it stopped it became apparent that it was a saucer craft that  has some kind of propulsion on the bottom of the saucer. it also had a dome and was dark gray in color and made no sound whatsoever. there was a row of what may have been windows but were long and thin markings along the rim. i felt as if this craft had to duck thru the clouds as a sort of evasive monuever because it seemed to be sneaking along the bottom of the clouds..The object had some type of distortion  effect on the atmosphere around it. i lost sight of it as it went through the heavy snow towards the bay.
content.summary: Fell through the clouds like a falling jet then hovered towards the horizon towards newark bay!

content.detailedDescription: Saw 2 white cigar shaped objects moving through the mountains appx speed 100 mph maricopa nm the motion was like a blimp but much to fast one dropped something from it that created sparks in the sky it navigated though the pass then disapeered behind the mountains !
content.summary: Saw 2 white cigar shaped objects moving through mountains.
